name: Cattitude
description:
Live the Secret Life of Cats

A Game made for the Make-a-Thing Game Jam 2018

Play nice for your owner and receive treats that fuel your rage.

When she isn't looking.... Smash Up The Place!

Don't get caught being a bad kitty!

Design - Seychelle Atkinson    stellarsey.itch.io

Programming - Liam Harvey   

Controls

Hold LMB and Move Mouse - move

Hold LMB and RMB - Rage

Space - Jump

R - reset cat if you fall out of the world.....
